metadata.name: UAC Bypass via ICMLuaUtil
metadata.comment: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using ICMLuaUtil Elevated COM interface

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\dllhost.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('/processid:{3e5fc7f9-9a51-4367-9063-a120244fbec7}')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('/processid:{d2e7041b-2927-42fb-8e9f-7ce93b6dc937}'))) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\werfault.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('werfault.exe')))

output.summary: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using ICMLuaUtil Elevated COM interface
